articles.description: Madhya Pradesh coach talks up "extremely confident" Raghuwanshi, lauds captain Shrivastava for "making 50% of the match" for the team

articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: ‘We reserve high praise for a player, then he disappears…’: Kapil Dev on Umran - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Umran Malik's thunderbolts won rave reviews from international cricketers and he was ultimately issued a maiden call-up for the ongoing T20I series versus South Africa.
articles.content: Speed demon Umran Malik emerged as a future star following a stellar Indian Premier League (IPL) season with Sunrisers Hyderabad. The tearaway quick from Jammu & Kashmir made headlines, thanks to… [+2738 chars]
